title: iOS Lead
jobDescription:
• Acting as Team Lead, depending on the skill sets can lead on one platform and play a supporting role across others.
  • To develop mobile apps for iPhone OS, iPad and iPod touch devices for our global clients.
  • Working closely with another mobile app developer leading the other platform development.
  • Deliver cross the entire app life cycle concept, design, build, deploy, test release to apps stores and support.
  • Working directly with developers and product managers to conceptualize, build, test and release products.
  • Working along the developers to create and maintain a robust framework to support the apps.
  • Working with developers to build the interface with focus on usability features.
  • Keep up to date on the latest industry trends in the mobile technologies.
  • Explain technologies and solutions to technical and non technical stake holders.
  • Continue to explore new APIs and always be on the leading edge of the iphone OS releases.
  • Communicate with the clients directly on daily project status, risk and future project cycles.
  • Implement creative app ideas for the app store.

title: Android Testing
jobDescription:
Â 

  • Bachelor/Master of engineering degree in CS, IS,ECE
  • Min Experience - 3 yrs. of testing in a software testing
  • Experience of STB Testing/Consumer Electronics products
  • Knowledge of Android TV / STB Product testing
  • Working knowledge of Set Top Box, android TV framework and Client certifications, middleware and OTT solutions is a Must
  • Experience of basic network configuration
  • Primary responsibilities to test android TV STB (manual and automation).
  • Python programming experience is added advantage
  • Ability to absorb multiple requirements and provide issue analysis and good problem solving skills.
  • Engineer should be well versed with test processes, test planning and test designing.
  • Knowledge of MPEG, IPTV DVB Standards
  • Knowledge of HDMI Dolby Standards
  • Knowledge of Linux Operating System
  • Knowledge of Any test Management Tool
  • Experience of Software Quality Processes Development Lifecycles
  • Good interpersonal, communication, presentation and reporting skills
Desirable Skills
  • Knowledge of programming languages, e.g. Perl, TCL,PYTHON
  • Knowledge of Automation Test Framework / Software Testing Tools

Duties and Responsibilities
  • Manual and Automated test execution on Android STBs
  • Maintain all test environments
  • To identify, characterize and report all software issues
  • To accurately report the status and progress of testing and the performance and usability of the software
  • Participate in and contribute to formal Design and Project Reviews
  • Communicate clearly and concisely at all levels.
  • Adhere to the Organizations Policies
  • Attention to detail and assigned tasks to be delivered as per Organization Quality Standards and Time-Lines
  • Learning Technology and Business Process (as per the assigned Functional/Technical area)
  • Work Independently whenever required

title: Senior Programmer Analyst
jobDescription:
We are looking for a talented web/hybrid mobile application developers with 2-4 years of experience; the primary responsibility is to design and develop these layers of our applications, and to coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure. A commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and quality product is essential.

  • Work on meaningful and challenging projects with real world impact.
  • Object oriented design/development skills
  • Must possess very strong technical skills.
  • Should have successfully designed and implemented large sized high-performance and scalable solutions.
  • Experience designing applications for cloud deployment.
  • Must understand trends in technology and be able to leverage them in technical solutions.
  • Must be able to design and implement frameworks for technical solutions.
  • Familiarity with Databases (MySQL/SQL)
  • Hybrid application development
  • Good to have skills HTML / HTML5 , CSS
  • One or more of the MVC JavaScript frameworks Ideally Angular JS.
  • Organize requirements into development tasks. Refine existing designs and implementations.
  • Troubleshoot technology problem areas
  • Learn new tools and technologies and do a quick POC
  • Enthusiastic candidates would be trained on various latest trending technologies such as NodeJS, AngularJS , ExtJS , and Angular Material Design, to develop and maintain custom applications irrespective of their previous technical skills.
Application development skill set required
  • Frontend Framework : Angular JS,React JS Ext JS, AJAX, Javascript, MYSQL and MVC architecture
  • Frontend Design: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, AJAX, jQuery
  • Backend : NodeJS, Android/ Java
Technical Skill
  • Web Services others: JSON , XML, XHTML and RESTful services
  • Languages: C# , Java core and JavaSE (basics)
  • Database: SQL, MySQL
